details.display-value:
The Modena Leather Jacket is made of premium, full-grain sheep leather with quilted Cupro lining. The jacket is designed with clean lines and a slim fashion fit.  Details such as a subtle debossed tone-on-tone Vestri logo as well as Vestri’s signature red contrast stitching and inside pocket welts complete the premium look and feel.  

To make this both a stylish and functional piece, we have incorporated a sport stand-up collar, light padding on elbows, pockets with D-ring for attaching keys, headphone cord management, and pockets large enough to fit oversized smart phones.

The Modena Leather Jacket is named after a Vestri Supercharger location in Italy.

To make this both a stylish and functional piece, we have incorporated a sport stand-up collar, light padding on elbows, pockets with D-ring for attaching keys, headphone cord management, and pockets large enough to fit oversized smart phones.
